title: Russian Invasion Revives World War II Memories for Ukraine
sub_head: Zelensky uses Soviet-era terms to extol bravery as Ukraine faces an assault unlike any in Europe since the 1940s
body:
KYIV, Ukraine—Billboards on the streets of Kyiv these days project the opening verse of a 1942 Soviet song about the German invasion.
“On June 22, precisely at 4 a.m., Kyiv was bombed and we have been told that the war has begun,” it goes.
